mapper.update: update projects set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, charge_user_id = #{chargeUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=DATE}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=DATE}, filepath = #{filepath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, note_taker = #{noteTaker,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, record_time = #{recordTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, name, charge_user_id, start_time, end_time, filepath, address, note_taker, record_time from projects where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, name, charge_user_id, start_time, end_time, filepath, address, note_taker, record_time from projects
